casebody.data:
Dayton Bar Association v. Marzocco.

[Cite as Dayton Bar Assn. v. Marzocco (1994), 71 Ohio St.3d 306.]

(No. 94-537 Submitted October 11, 1994 Decided December 23, 1994.) *309Edward J. Dowd, for relator. Ralph L. Marzocco, pro se. Per Curiam.

This court agrees with the findings and recommendation of the board. Respondent is hereby indefinitely suspended from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
